name: Jungle Kid Adventure Run - Dark Fantasy
name_original: Jungle Kid Adventure Run - Dark Fantasy
description:
Dark Forest Fantasy is Arrived,why are you waiting for,try this awesome thrilling Endless runner game with Brand New Character.

Dark Forest Fantasy is an endless running action game. He may look like just a kid, but he is a fearless Jungle Kid on a wild run. The jungle is his playground and at night he runs through the Dark Forest. But in his adventure lies some obstacles that can take him down. Now it's your Adventure to run him the dark forest, jump over the cliffs, collect the Red powers and run faster and faster as far as you can!!!

Features:
Excellent Graphics and Audio Effects
Tap to Jump, Tap and Hold to Jump Higher game play
